modals.swap_token: After confirmation, the power plant will begin producing {energyType} energy. Please note: changing the asset being produced will reset the previous balance.
modals.swap_modal: You will be able to change the mined asset in {time}.

speedup.title: Choose action
speedup.description_1: You can speed up the connection process or start connecting another wallet. The connection will be completed in:
speedup.description_2: The connection of equipment purchased on the secondary market is in progress. This may take some time. You can skip this process by clicking the "Speed up" button.
speedup.body: You can skip this process by clicking the «Speed up» button.

wallet_change_info.body: You can skip this process, by clicking on the rocket icon.

update.title: Update available!
update.body: The application will be reloaded in 5 seconds.

upgrade.buy_station_desc: To purchase the station, confirm the deduction of assets from your wallet.
upgrade.station_repair_desc: To repair the station, confirm the deduction of assets from your wallet.
upgrade.hire_eng_desc: Not enough kW to buy the right level of engineers? Use STARS and continue your development without limits!

mintable.terms_text: To create {station_new} NFT, your wallet must contain two {station_old} NFTs. The second {station_old} NFT can be purchased on GetGems or built independently by starting progress from scratch.

overheat.title: Warning
overheat.message: Station overheated! Wait for the cooling process to complete, which will take some time.
overheat.warning: It is forbidden to mine energy when the power station is overheated, this will lead to its breakdown.

wallet_lock.title: Wallet change detected!
wallet_lock.message: Warning! The wallet address has been changed. The power station is paused during the connection process. Time remaining:

afterheat.message: To start the station, click on the switch that appeared on your screen.

cancel_rent.title: Warning!
cancel_rent.message_delete: By clicking "Confirm", you agree to delete the rental record of your equipment. It will become available for mining again. If you have mining running at the time of confirmation, it will be restarted.
cancel_rent.message_cancel: By clicking "Confirm", you agree to cancel the rental of your equipment. If you have mining running at the time of confirmation, it will be restarted.

craft_station.message_renew: All progress of {station} NFT will be reset. By clicking "Confirm", you agree to return to Boiler House and start building a new {station} from scratch.
craft_station.message_mint: To create {station} NFT, confirm the deduction of assets from your balance.
craft_station.message_mint_burn: Important! NFTs used in the creation process will be burned!
craft_station.message_mint_special: Important! If you sell the received NFT, the mined kW balance and progress will be reset, and you will return to Boiler House.
craft_station.message_notfound: NFT {station} not found. Progress will be reset. By clicking "Confirm", you agree to rollback the current station to Boiler House, cancel kW and lose engineers.
craft_station.nft_sent_burn: Your NFTs have been sent to the burn address, the process of creating {station} NFT has started.
craft_station.progress_reset: Your current progress has been reset.

friend_info.message: Referral bonuses are available for 7 days. After this period, the tokens will be burned.

switch_station_modal.title: Warning!
switch_station_modal.to_regular_yellow: After disconnecting the NFT power station, your previous progress will be restored. The saved energy balance will be added to your current yellow energy balance.
switch_station_modal.to_regular_blue: After disconnecting the NFT power station, your previous progress will be restored. The blue energy balance will be reset.
switch_station_modal.to_orbital: After connecting the NFT power station, your current progress and "yellow" energy balance will be saved.

engineers_blocked_modal.title: Warning!
engineers_blocked_modal.message: Engineers reward is not available while orbital or hydroelectric station is active. Switch to a regular power station to claim this reward.

mining_stopped.message: Internet connection was interrupted, which led to the mining stop.

mint_modal.title: Mint kW
mint_modal.description:
Select the amount to create kW token 
mined by {address}
mint_modal.request_accepted: kW mint request accepted. {tokens} kW tokens will be created within {time}
mint_modal.check_data: Check the correctness of the entered data in the field
mint_modal.next_mint_available: Next token mint will be available in {time}

reconnect_modal.title: Choose the correct answer
reconnect_modal.wrong_answer: You chose the wrong answer, the next attempt will be available in 10 minutes.

redirect_modal.title: Warning!
redirect_modal.message_mythic: You will be redirected to the largest NFT marketplace {marketplace}, which features the entire {collection} collection, each with a unique appearance.
redirect_modal.message_gems: You will be redirected to the largest NFT marketplace {marketplace}, which features the entire {collection} collection.

rent_ban_modal.title: Action blocked!
rent_ban_modal.message: Warning! Your tenant rating is -{points} points. Rental capability is blocked for {days} days.

rent_modal.title: Attention!
rent_modal.confirm_rent_in: By clicking "Confirm", you agree to the rental terms. If mining is running at the time of confirmation, it will be restarted.
rent_modal.rule_1: kW deduction for mining rented ASICs occurs every 24 hours.
rent_modal.rule_2: If you don't have enough kW at the time of deduction, the rental will be cancelled and your tenant rating will decrease by 1 point.
rent_modal.rule_3: If within 12 hours after network disconnection you don't resume connection, the rental will be cancelled and you will also receive -1 point.
rent_modal.rule_4: When reaching -3 points, equipment rental will be blocked for 7 days.
rent_modal.confirm_rent_out: By clicking "Confirm", you agree to place your equipment for rent. If the NFT being placed for rent is currently used in mining, mining will be restarted.
rent_modal.miner_income: Miner income in fBTC for rental period:
rent_modal.income_period: Income in fBTC for rental period:
rent_modal.asic_successfully_placed: Your ASIC has been successfully placed and is available for rent.

special_price_modal.title: Attention!
special_price_modal.mint_price_message: The mint price in the smart contract is {price} TON. A discount of {discount} TON ({percentage}) will be sent to you within 12 hours after minting {name}

tutorial_carousel.slide_1_title: Welcome to Web 3.0 mining project TonBitcoin
tutorial_carousel.slide_1_description: Here the fBTC token is mined - your own Bitcoin on the TON blockchain
tutorial_carousel.slide_2_description: Manage power plants like Energizer and sell kW tokens on DEX in one click for real TON
tutorial_carousel.slide_3_description: Mine fBTC token as a Miner using NFT Asic equipment
tutorial_carousel.slide_4_description: Rent out NFT Asic equipment or earn % from fBTC token staking as an Investor
tutorial_carousel.slide_5_title: Start mining kW token in the TonBitcoin project and already on day 7 trade it on DEX exchange, getting real TON.

task_modal.task_not_completed: Task conditions are not met. Please complete the specified conditions and try again.

upgrade_modal.engineer_hired: Engineer hired, single tap power increased!

withdraw_staking_modal.withdraw_balance_request_accepted: Withdrawal request for fBTC from accumulated balance accepted. {amount} fBTC tokens will be credited within several minutes
withdraw_staking_modal.withdraw_deposit_request_accepted: Deposit withdrawal request accepted. {amount} fBTC tokens will be credited to your wallet within 24 hours

notification.forever_boost_duration: Extension is not possible — this boost is already activated forever.
notification.max_boost_duration: The total duration of active boosters cannot exceed 30 days. Use the desired booster when the duration of the active booster becomes shorter than the extension period within this limit.

game.run_start_subtitle: Dodge obstacles to reach maximum energy.
game.pause_subtitle: The run is paused. Take a short break or return to the main screen.
game.win_subtitle: Great run, you passed the entire distance!
game.lose_subtitle: Try again to collect more energy.
game.training_warning: Important! Training run results are not saved
game.training_run_limit_exceeded: Hourly training run limit reached. Used: {used}/{max}
game.graphics_modal_body:
For your device we recommend the "Low" graphics mode.
Enabling the "Normal" mode may reduce FPS and increase device temperature.
game.overheat_desc: Wait for the cooling process to complete, which will take some time. Using the power station when overheated will lead to its breakdown.
game.nitrogen_pay_desc: Pay for liquid nitrogen with Stars or fBTC — it will one-time clear the overheat and you can resume the run.
game.overheat_ready_desc: Station is ready to use, press continue button to resume the run.
game.start_run_warning_message:
After starting the run, your accumulated storage balance will be deducted for point generation.

Your engineer has 3 lives and one additional life to complete the entire distance and collect energy.

Exiting the run is not possible.

We recommend doing several training runs before starting the actual run.

slider.miner: Miner: Mine your Bitcoin on TON - fBTC
slider.investor: Investor: Earn from those who earn

preloader.agent_text: Security system detected suspicious activity. Your account has been blocked for violating TonBitcoin project rules
preloader.maintenance_text: Attention! Scheduled maintenance is being performed. Upon completion, users will be notified in the TonBitcoin project Telegram channel.

dashboard.profit_modal: Profitability is indicated without taking into account the cost of kW, as many produce energy for their ASICs on their own.

main.jarvis_desc: AI assistant JARVIS will collect energy instead of you. Thanks to applied cryotechnologies, JARVIS collects energy without overheating the power station.
main.overheat_desc: Wait for the cooling process to complete, which will take some time. Using the power station when overheated will lead to its breakdown.

asic_shop.title: Gems Shop
asic_shop.promo_banner_text: Hurry up to buy ASICs with 50% discount! Limited time offer!

gems.promo_banner_text: Hurry up to buy GEMS with 50% discount! Limited time offer!
gems.dao_owner_item_1: 1% share in the project potential which amounts to more than 1 million TON
gems.dao_owner_item_2: Project shareholders meeting and closed report on project plans
gems.dao_owner_item_3: Monthly P&L analysis of revenue and expense plans
gems.dao_owner_item_4: Separate chat for quick communication and discussions and separate AMA sessions
gems.dao_owner_item_5: Opportunity to directly influence the project development vector by contributing your ideas and initiatives
gems.dao_owner_item_6: Help the project scale and develop, significantly increasing the value of your current project assets
gems.dao_owner_item_7: After the project's financial performance growth, opportunity to sell your project share at a significantly higher price
gems.dao_owner_price_info: Investment in the future of TonBitcoin project.
gems.starter_pack_title: Package offer for new project users:
gems.starter_pack_item_1: Ready-made Nuclear Power Plant Level 5, mining 5300 kW/d
gems.starter_pack_item_5: ASIC S11 XP Epic class, mining 15 fBTC/d
gems.starter_pack_item_6: ASIC S15 XP Epic class, mining 37.5 fBTC/d
gems.starter_pack_item_8: Important! The process of minting and sending NFTs may take up to 24 hours.
gems.starter_pack_price_info: The total base cost of 3 NFTs and their boosts is about 250 TON.
gems.starter_pack_price_offer: Package price for beginners is only {price} TON.
gems.jarvis_bot_info: Featuring the most advanced cryogenic technology with AI, this booster completely eliminates the occurrence of overheating in your power plant while the AI handles energy harvesting on its own. The best choice for the best results.
gems.repair_kit_info: A set of specialized tools instantly eliminates malfunctions, preventing wear and tear of your power station during energy generation. You no longer need to repair your power plant manually.
gems.cryochamber_info: The use of a cryochamber in your power plant will completely eliminate the occurrence of overheating.
gems.asic_manager_info: An experienced miner that will help you forget about downtime of your equipment due to internet outages! It automatically starts mining as soon as your connection is lost, ensuring uninterrupted mining.
gems.magnetic_ring_info: An advanced innovation that reduces the power consumption of connected ASIC hardware by 20%.
gems.hydroelectric_description: Limited Special Class Power Station. Released in limited quantity of only 30 units.
gems.hydroelectric_item_5: This station mines kW token directly, bypassing the "yellow" energy mining stage
gems.hydroelectric_info_1: Building other stations, buying engineers using the mining output of this station is not possible.
gems.hydroelectric_info_2: All your progress before installing this station is preserved, and if you sell it, you will continue from where you left off
gems.orbital_description: A unique power plant has the following characteristics:
gems.orbital_item_4: Equipped with level 45 engineers for maximum efficiency and comfort
gems.orbital_income: Income from energy sales (at the current kW rate) — over 70 TON per month.
gems.orbital_unique: The station not only produces a huge amount of kW tokens, but also 'yellow' energy required for developing standard power plants, upgrades, and hiring engineers.
gems.orbital_progress: With this station, you can easily reach level 7 in Dyson Sphere power plant development.
gems.orbital_instruction_intro: To craft the Orbital Power Plant, follow these steps:
gems.orbital_step_1: Send two Hydroelectric Power Station NFTs to the burn wallet:
gems.orbital_step_2: Pay 2000 fBTC for crafting to the Project Development Fund address:
gems.orbital_note: Important! Within 1 day, the Orbital Power Plant will be crafted and sent back to your wallet.
gems.orbital_instruction_full:
Orbital Power Plant craft instruction:

1) Send two Hydroelectric Power Station NFTs to the burn wallet:
UQAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAJKZ

2) Pay 2000 fBTC for crafting to the Project Development Fund address:
UQB0ukWTZXHQhlhztL91277hD8xbFFKXiHVvSBNw-gcBKHfO

Important! Within 1 day, the Orbital Power Plant will be crafted and sent back to your wallet.

wheel.no_prizes: No prizes for the current filter
